results.title: Prestroke Metformin Use on the 1-Year Prognosis of Intracerebral Hemorrhage Patients with Type 2 Diabetes
results.text_hl: Thus, the relationship between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use, @<m>DISEASE_Hematoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006406 @@@hematoma@@@ volumes, and @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ prognosis could not be confirmed.
